statements: SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-09-15' AND timestamp < '2022-09-20';
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY message_id ASC;

SELECT message_id, message, sender_id FROM chat_messages WHERE message LIKE 'Hello%' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT message_id, sender_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 2 OR sender_id = 3 ORDER BY sender_id, timestamp;

SELECT message_id, sender_id, recipient_id FROM ChatMessages WHERE sender_id = 1;
